entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
